title:
HRAT - ATRH
Minutes / Compte-rendu
text:
This meeting will be hosted by data group member, Adam Słociński.

Vital stats
Five minute scrum / ask anything
Activity selection game.

Activity selection game
Three possible activities can be selected based off two rounds of dice rolls.

The round table activity is where each team member provides an update to the rest of the team about their tasks. The show the thing activity is a chance for a team member to show their latest work to the team and get constructive feedback. The wild card activity is a chance for the team to choose how to spend the remainder of the meeting time together without a predefined selection.

See Table 1 for probabilities.
The process from your perspective




flowchart TD
    A(( )) --> B(Open dice roller)
    B --> C(Roll 1 die) --> D(Provide results to<br>host)
    D --> E{Did you <br>complete <br>two rounds?}
    E --> F(No) ---> C
    E --> G(Yes)
    G --> H(Tally results) --> I{Was there <br>a tie?} --> J(No) --> L(Proceed with selected activity)
    I --> K(Yes) --> C
    L --> M((( )))








N.B.: Open Random.Org to roll your virtual dice.



The associated dice number and probabilities for various activities.


Table 1: Group activity selection results


id
activity options
dice no.
prob.




1
round table
1
17%


2
show the thing
2 or 3
33%


3
wild card
4, 5 or 6
50%










Take a moment to reflect on this meeting.

What were two things you got out of this meeting?
What was one thing you would not repeat?
Next host will be asdfasdf on Tuesday, October 10th, 2023.
